en-US.name: Radio RMF FM
en-US.description:
Plays Radio RMF FM Poland on your Alexa device!
Simply say "Alexa open radio RMF FM" and listen to your favourite Polish Radio station.
The radio station is in Polish and features varying genres of music.
Say "Alexa stop" to stop playing.
en-US.updatesDescription: A complete rewrite of the application! Unfortunately no new features but a lot of bug fixes!
